actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1871 of title 28 of the United States Code relating to the travel allowance of grand and petit jurors.

summary.text: Removes the subsistence allowance, which would be paid to a juror if he had remained at the place of trial overnight or during temporary recess, as the ceiling for daily travel expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1871 of title 28 of the United States Code relating to the travel allowance of grand and petit jurors.
